articles.author: TIMESOFINDIA.COM
articles.title: Shiv Sena leader Sanjay Raut questioned for 10 hours by ED in money laundering case
articles.description: Shiv Sena MP Sanjay Raut was questioned by the Enforcement Directorate (ED) for over 10 hours on Friday in connection with a money laundering probe. Raut reached the ED office located at the Ballard Estate in south Mumbai around 11.30 am and left around 10 pm.
